verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> there is no <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> himself <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> known <S%G1722>openly.<s%> <S%G3954><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G5319>show<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> My <S%G1699><s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> come: <S%G3918><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> ready. <S%G2092><s%>

Go ye up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5210><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> feast: <S%G1859><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> go not up yet <S%G305><s%> <S%G3768><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1859>feast;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> full come. <S%G4137><s%>
When <S%G1161><s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>words<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G3306>abode<s%> still <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> were gone <S%G305>up,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> went he also <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5320>openly,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G2076>is<s%> a good <S%G18>man:<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3756>Nay;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he <S%G4105>deceiveth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> he shall <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> <S%G4220>whether<s%> it <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> whether <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> myself. <S%G1683><s%>

He that <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> glory: <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Did <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> yet <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4160>keepeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law?<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> go ye <S%G2212>about<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> me? <S%G3165><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> I have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G3956>all<s%> marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

Moses <S%G3475><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision;<s%> <S%G3756>(not<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>fathers;)<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> should <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G3089>broken;<s%> are ye <S%G5520>angry<s%> at <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I have <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> every <S%G3650>whit<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath day? <S%G4521><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> them of <S%G2415>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2076>Is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> he, <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill?<s%>

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> this <S%G5126>man<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> he <S%G2076>is:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> he <S%G2076>is.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple<s%> as he <S%G1321>taught,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Ye both know me, <S%G2504><s%> <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> I am: <S%G1510><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G228>true,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G4084>take<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> then I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

Ye shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> me: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am,<s%> thither <S%G5210>ye<s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> manner of <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Ye shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> me: <S%G2532>and<s%> where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am,<s%> thither <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come?<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> that <S%G3173>great<s%> day of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1372>thirst,<s%> let him <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> drink. <S%G4095><s%>

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> hath <S%G2036>said,<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%> shall <S%G4482>flow<s%> <S%G4215>rivers<s%> of <S%G2198>living<s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>

(But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2036>spake<s%> he <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2983>receive:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> given; <S%G3754>because<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was not <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1392>glorified.)<s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> this <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>Prophet.<s%>
